alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin, northwestern Pine, southern St. Louis and Carlton Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Cotton, to near Tamarack, to near Vineland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tamarack around 740 PM CDT. Cotton around 745 PM CDT. Malmo around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cromwell, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Boulder Lake, Cloquet, McGrath and Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; Southern Lake, North Shore
